item.title: DIS
item.description: score:86 Chances: The entertainment giant’s finally starting to figure out what’s wrong, and how to fix it. Are more dividend hikes likely coming from these stocks? The deal is valued at $7.8 billion, according to an ESPN report. Disney, along with Warner Bros Discovery and Fox Corp, is set to launch a sports streaming venture this fall, in hopes of drawing in younger viewers.
